positions.subtitle: Jupiter
positions.description: --> Researched and learnt about 10+ Indian Financial Products. This includes both recent and legacy innovations like NFS, AePS, RuPay, UPI, BHIM, LRS, e-RUPI, NETC FASTag, BBPS, etc to name a few. --> Took 200+ user interviews to record and validate their pain points. Thus helped to improve the Full KYC funnel of the Jupiter app.
